amendatorysection.catchline: Department; plans, contracts, funds; tax credit program; duties.
amendatorysection.para: (1) Submit and adopt all necessary plans, enter into contracts, and accept gifts, grants, and federal funds; and
(2) Administer the tax credit program established by the Community Development Assistance Act and adopt and promulgate rules and regulations pursuant to such act.

crossreference.para: Community Development Assistance Act, see section 13-201.
